Name: Inexperienced Driver
About the game: 'Inexperienced Driver' is a top-down arcade driving game. The player has to drive from point A to point B and, if possible, collect all the banknotes on the road while avoiding obstacles. The game has 15 levels, the difficulty is getting higher while you progress. There are several types of obstacles from a banal banana peel to a huge hole wher your car can fall, it is also possible to puncture the wheels and it becomes very difficult to drive a car. The game is family friendly and is suitable for children!
